mapper.select: SELECT a_id,c_id,p1.name AS province,p2.name AS city,street,postcode,address.name,phone FROM address LEFT JOIN place p1 ON p1.p_id=address.province LEFT JOIN place p2 ON p2.p_id=city WHERE c_id =#{c_id} GROUP BY a_id ORDER BY a_id DESC
SELECT p_id,NAME FROM place ORDER BY p_id LIMIT 0,34
SELECT * FROM place WHERE province = #{province} and province!=0
SELECT a_id FROM address ORDER BY a_id DESC
